title: Firefox 102.0.1.8221 launch causes Windows 7 64bit to reboot
content:
Last few days any Firefox 102.0.1.8221 launch causes my Windows 7 64bit to reboot, usually when I try to mouse click anything in Firefox after it's fired up and restored open tabs, however even if I don't mouse click anything Firefox will force a reboot within a minute or so.

This Firefox Win 7 reboot behaviour only started after the last Firefox update, though I would point out that around update version 100.nn I started getting failed update notifications from within Firefox which necessitated a manual newer version Firefox download and install.

Running Windows 7 in safe mode with networking on allows Firefox to function without crashing, albeit slowly and with no MSE protection available etc.

Only one crash report dated 16/07/2022 with following content: Crash ID: bp-d8383165-9c77-45e4-9929-a3ce12160527

Please note I'm sending this report via Firefox on my iMac coz that still works...
creator: JabbaLeChat

title: suddenly firefox will not start
content: hi, from yesterday, firefox suddenly would not start on my iMac when i click on the icon in the dock. I do believe i have not changed any settings or downloaded any updates for anything. The only way i can get firefox to run is if i use terminal to get into the firefox profile manager and then select the default profile and click start firefox. Then it runs normally. However when i quit the application the only way i that i can reopen firefox is through the profile manager route. Any ideas what i can do??
creator: 1957price

title: intrupt a pop-up page
content:
when I open a page it transfer to another page that is written:

Dear Firefox user, You are today’s lucky visitor for: July 24, 2022 Please complete this short survey and to say “Thank You” we’ll give you a chance to get an Apple iPhone 11 Pro!"

And I can't open the page that I want, and this sometimes happen and sometimes not, what should I do.

title: Installation
content: Hello, I have downloaded the Firefox browser in the past and used it for maybe 30 minutes or so. I cannot recall, but it would crash and then when I would try and open it, it just flashes for a second and instantly crashes so I am unable to use it. This seems to happen with both the installer and the Microsoft app.
creator: Tchilly

title: Cannot set cookie preferences when using Firefox
content:
Hi:

I tried to set cookie preferences for different websites. For reasons that I do not understand, I cannot move the "slider". I even turned of the existing protection for the websites, but nothing changed. I tried the same with Safari using the same computer and mouse, and I had no problems.

Is this a known bug?

I attached a screen capture. Thanks.
creator: Zsuzsu

title: Need help deleting items from the tool bar.
content: Can't seem to delete items from the tool bar.
creator: geraldvinson

title: Continued uncontrolled scrolling by Firefox 102.01 64bit
content:
This problem has continued for a number of weeks now, it is unacceptable. Much as I have enjoyed Firefox over the years, I have had enough and will return to Microsoft's offering (Edge).

Too little too late about sums up the efforts to fix this problem I have seen displayed by Mozilla.
creator: WilliamBowley

title: Finding primary email address
content:
Hello,

I'm trying to find out what email I had previously setup as my primary email for Firefox sync. I went to sign in with an email that apparently is a "secondary email" and it says I need to sign in with the primary account. Out of the 4 email address that I have ever used, none of them (even after creating new firefox accounts with) say or show that they are the "primary account" attached to this "secondary account" I am trying to use.

I only want to use my email that it keeps saying I need to sign into my "primary account first in order to use that email" to be completely honest I don't ever remember setting this email up as a secondary for any of my Firefox accounts.

What are my options here can I really not find out the email address of this "primary account" so I can use it to remove it as "primary"??
creator: dan.100785

title: password
content: Firefox does not accept the password I created today. When I tried to change it they asked for the current one and again rejected it.
